description.value:
Your invention heats up its core before releasing a wave of cleansing steam. You gain an immediate save against all persistent elemental (fire, ice, lightning, earth, water, and wind) damage effects, using the DC for particularly effective help.

Special If your invention is a minion, it can take this action rather than you.

Overcharge Function (fire, water) In addition to this action's other effects, all other creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] take @Damage[(ternary(gte(@actor.level,20),8,ternary(gte(@actor.level,17),7,ternary(gte(@actor.level,14),6,ternary(gte(@actor.level,11),5,ternary(gte(@actor.level,8),4,ternary(gte(@actor.level,5),3,2)))))))d6[fire]] or @Damage[(ternary(gte(@actor.level,20),8,ternary(gte(@actor.level,17),7,ternary(gte(@actor.level,14),6,ternary(gte(@actor.level,11),5,ternary(gte(@actor.level,8),4,ternary(gte(@actor.level,5),3,2)))))))d6[water-ff]] damage, whichever would be more damaging.

If piloting or riding your invention, you may choose to exclude yourself from the emanation.

Overcharge Level (+3) The damage increases by 1d6
